definition: the storm put strong grass to the test (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test/also written 疾風勁草|疾风劲草
the storm put strong grass to the test, fire tests true gold (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test
pinyin: ji2 feng1 zhi1 jin4 cao3 , lie4 huo3 jian4 zhen1 jin1
containing_words.word: 疾風知勁草，烈火見真金

sentences.english: A true friend is known in the day of adversity.
sentences.chinese: 疾風知勁草，患難知友情。

sentences.english: Friend is never known till a man has need.
sentences.chinese: 疾風知勁草，到患難時，才能認識誰是真正的朋友。
